manifest.name: Home Maintenance Crew
manifest.author: Donegeon Team
manifest.description: A set of quests for learning basic home repair and maintenance skills.

quests.title: Tool Time
quests.description: Help organize the toolbox or a tool drawer.

quests.title: Master of the Batteries
quests.description: Test and replace the batteries in all smoke detectors or remote controls.

quests.title: The Lightbringer
quests.description: With supervision, help replace a burnt-out lightbulb.

quests.title: The Unclogger
quests.description: Help clear a minor clog in a sink or drain.

quests.title: Painting Apprentice
quests.description: Help with a small painting project, like touching up a wall.

quests.title: Assembly Assistant
quests.description: Help assemble a new piece of furniture.

markets.title: The Hardware Hank's
markets.description: Tools and equipment for the handy adventurer.

gameAssets.name: Hard Hat
gameAssets.description: A yellow hard hat for your avatar.

gameAssets.name: Toolbelt
gameAssets.description: A toolbelt for your avatar's collection.

gameAssets.name: New Tool
gameAssets.description: A real-world reward: a new, age-appropriate tool for your collection.
